Meetup App

Its a web app built to quickly organize and post meetups for any activities, users can sign up and log in, create meetups,view meetups, edit meetups and also register for meetups they didn't create. When organizing for meetups you add the images, the location and the time of meetup as well us the activities or items to be discussed.

Technology

Meetup app uses Vuetify for mobile-first layout and also to make the UI as appealing as possible, Vue featres have also been used to make the app as light, On the back end Nodejs has been used, firebase has also been used on the backend to accomplish sone other tasks, it also makes use of the realtime firebase database, which quickly and instantly returns the information to the user.

Go to App on Web
